name: perMUcussion
body:
### Welcome!

### Software
Click HERE to download two Java applications created for drummers/percussionists - perMUmet is a basic general-purpose metronome - perMUbeat is a beat generator that once a beat is entered you can experiment with permutations of that beat.  Have Fun!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
